title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 2370.4 - Index of records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 2370.4 - Index of records

State Regulations
(a) The
records access officer shall maintain and make available for public inspection
and copying a current list, by subject matter, of those records, as enumerated
within the Freedom of Information Law which are available for public
inspection, filed or first kept or promulgated after September 1, 1974. The
list shall be sufficiently detailed to permit the requester to identify the
file category of the record sought. (b) The records access officer is authorized
and may comprise the subject matter index by the specific article and section
of the Tax Law of New York. (c) The
subject matter list shall be updated periodically, and the date of the most
recent updating shall be listed first. The updating of the subject matter list
shall not be less than semiannual. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
ยง
2370.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
